CustomField.formula: IF( OR( Product_Line__c = "DTE Axiom", Product_Line__c = "Time Builder", Product_Line__c = "Intapp Time" ), "Time", IF( OR( Product_Line__c = "Intapp Open - Conflicts", Product_Line__c = "Intapp Open - Intake" ), "Business Acceptance", IF( Product_Line__c = "Integration Builder", "Integration", IF( Product_Line__c = "Wall Builder", "Confidentiality", IF( OR( Product_Line__c = "Records Management", Product_Line__c = "TFG - Other" ), "LegalKey", "Unknown" ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Product Line - Simple
